formulas.description: [Monthly Gross Income - ( [20%(Monthly gross income)] - [standard deduction from Ref Table EDSNAPDEDUCTION] - dependent care expenses - child support expenses)]
formulas.name: adjustedGrossIncome

formulas.description: 1. If "Is anyone in the household age 60 or older, blind, or disabled?" = 'Yes': Adjusted Shelter Expense Value = Shelter Expense Value 2. "Else:Adjusted Shelter Expense Value = Lesser value of (value from step 2) OR (SNAP_MAX_EXS_SHL_AMT from Ref Table EDSNAPPARMS)"
formulas.name: adjustedShelterExpenseValue

formulas.description: Monthly gross income - monthly child support expenses
formulas.name: CCAP_Income

formulas.description: Reported monthly shelter expenses + Utility Allowance Determination
formulas.name: shelterExpenseValue
